text: Vishal Pandya is an Indian film director and screenwriter, who has directed Hate Story 2, Hate Story 3, Wajah Tum Ho & Hate Story 4 under the production house of T-Serieshttp://indianexpress.com/article/entertainment/screen/director-vishal- pandya-signs-a-three-film-deal-with-t-series/ ==Career== ===Directorial Debut: Three: Love, Lies, Betrayal=== Vishal Pandya's made his directorial debut with Three: Love, Lies, Betrayal in 2009. ===2014=== After 5 years got second chance in the 2014 erotic thriller film Hate Story 2, which was produced by T-Series owner Bhushan Kumar and Vikram Bhatt. The film was a sequel to the 2012 sleeper hit Hate Story.http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/news/Hate- Story-2-Sunny-Leones-oomph-will-benefit-the-film-feels- director/articleshow/36496954.cms?/ The film's nett gross was 22.90 crore and was declared "Average" by the Box Office India.http://www.boxofficeindia.com/movie.php?movieid=2285/ ===2015 (Box Office Success)=== After the success of Hate Story 2, Pandya directed the 2015 erotic thriller Hate Story 3. The film was the third installment of Hate Story (film series).http://indianexpress.com/article/entertainment/screen/vishal- pandya-to-helm-hate-story-3/ The film was declared as a "Hit" by the Box Office India.http://www.boxofficeindia.com/movie.php?movieid=3155/ ===2016=== He wrote and directed the 2016 erotic thriller Wajah Tum Ho.http://indianexpress.com/article/entertainment/bollywood/sharman-joshi-to- do-yet-another-erotic-thriller-film-with-vishal-pandya/ Despite being made on a small budget of 14 crore, the film failed to perform well at the box office and was also declared as a "Flop" by the Box Office India.http://www.boxofficeindia.com/movie.php?movieid=3439/ ===2018-present=== In 2018, he directed Hate Story 4 which opened with mixed to negative reviews. ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable" |+Key | style="background:#ffc;"| | Denotes films that have not yet been released |} {|class="wikitable" !
